tests.title: returns "No fine!" when daysLate is 0 or negative
tests.fullTitle: index.js lateFee() returns "No fine!" when daysLate is 0 or negative

tests.title: charges $1 per day for up to 7 days late
tests.fullTitle: index.js lateFee() charges $1 per day for up to 7 days late

tests.title: charges $2 per day for 8–30 days late
tests.fullTitle: index.js lateFee() charges $2 per day for 8–30 days late

tests.title: suspends membership after more than 30 days late
tests.fullTitle: index.js lateFee() suspends membership after more than 30 days late

tests.title: returns extended hours for Central branch
tests.fullTitle: index.js branchHours() returns extended hours for Central branch

tests.title: returns regular hours for any other branch
tests.fullTitle: index.js branchHours() returns regular hours for any other branch

tests.title: recommends bestsellers for fiction
tests.fullTitle: index.js recommendBookByGenre() recommends bestsellers for fiction

tests.title: recommends biographies for non-fiction
tests.fullTitle: index.js recommendBookByGenre() recommends biographies for non-fiction

tests.title: recommends graphic novels for comics
tests.fullTitle: index.js recommendBookByGenre() recommends graphic novels for comics

tests.title: gives a generic suggestion for any other genre
